tit.e: Rakunan shintoshi (literally, new city in the south of Kyoto)
Rakunan Shintoshi (literally, new city in the south of Kyoto)
tit.cmt: タイトルの頭文字を大文字に変更
tit.e: Rakunan Shintoshi (literally, new city in the south of Kyoto)

sen.j: 洛南新都市（らくなんしんとし）は、京都府京都市伏見区の淀川南部にある旧巨椋池干拓地に整備される予定の新都市。
sen.e: Rakunan shintoshi is a new city which is planned to be prepared in the reclaimed land from former Ogura-ike Pond in the south of Yodo-gawa River in Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City.
Rakunan shintoshi is a new city which is planned to be prepared in the reclaimed land from former Ogura-ike Pond in the south of Yodo-gawa River in Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 「京都府」→訳漏れのため訳出しました。
sen.e: Rakunan shintoshi is a new city which is planned to be prepared in the reclaimed land from former Ogura-ike Pond in the south of Yodo-gawa River in Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 洛南新都心（らくなんしんとしん）とも呼ばれる場合もある。
sen.e: It is sometimes called "Rakunan shintoshin (literally, new city center in the south of Kyoto)".
It is sometimes called "Rakunan shintoshin" (literally, new city center in the south of Kyoto).
sen.cmt: クォーテーションの位置を移動
sen.e: It is sometimes called "Rakunan shintoshin" (literally, new city center in the south of Kyoto).

sen.j: この新都市に京都市営地下鉄烏丸線を延伸する構想もあるが未着手である。
sen.e: There is an idea to extend the Karasuma line of Kyoto City Subway to this new city, but they have not yet moved into action.
There is an idea to extend the Karasuma line of Kyoto City Subway to this new city, but they have not yet moved into action.
There is an idea to extend the Karasuma line of Kyoto City Subway to this new city, but they have not yet moved into action.

sen.j: この新都市予定地近傍には京滋バイパスや第二京阪道路などが通っており交通の要衝ともなる。
sen.e: Because Keiji Bypass and the Second Keihan national highway run in the vicinity of the site of this new city, it will become the important point for traffic.
Because Keiji Bypass and the Second Keihan national highway run in the vicinity of the site of this new city, it will become the important point for traffic.
Because Keiji Bypass and the Second Keihan national highway run in the vicinity of the site of this new city, it will become the important point for traffic.

sen.j: また西京極球場に代わる大規模球場（名称未定）の構想もありうるが具体化していない。
sen.e: The idea of a large-scale ballpark (name is not determined yet) to replace Nishikyogoku ballpark is possible but it has not yet taken form.
The idea of a large-scale ballpark (name is not determined yet) to replace Nishikyogoku ballpark is possible but it has not yet taken form.
The idea of a large-scale ballpark (name is not determined yet) to replace Nishikyogoku ballpark is possible but it has not yet taken form.
